headers.text: Group - América Móvil - Freedom of Expression
OperatingCo - América Móvil - Freedom of Expression

cells.value: 1. Does the company clearly disclose that it provides employee training on freedom of expression and privacy issues?

2. Does the company clearly disclose that it maintains an employee whistleblower program through which employees can report concerns related to how the company treats its users' freedom of expression and privacy rights?
